QuestData.Title: Nethercite Ore
QuestData.Description: A miner!$B$B<Varkule salutes.>$B$BAn orc after my own heart! That's how Varkule got his start - minin'! There ain't nothin' better than getting down and dirty in the mines, is there?$B$BNow get out there and find those nethercite deposits. Strip 'em for all their worth and bring me back the ore.
QuestData.LogDescription: Taskmaster Varkule Dragonbreath at Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to bring him 40 Nethercite Ore.
QuestData.CompletionText: Gug over there is gonna use the ore to reinforce our weapons and armor.
QuestData.RewardText: You're done for today, kid. Come back tomorrow if you're still alive.
